page.title: 06R.A.R.D.E, Fort Halstead
page.content: At the{Royal Armament Research and {Development Establishment}Civil Service scientists develop weapons for all three Armed Services. The establishment is one of the{biggest {employers in the area. They do{research work}on all types of armaments and guided weapons systems. Just after the second world war, Sir William Penney developed Britain's first atomic bomb at R.A.R.D.E. The Sea Wolf missile, used in the Falklands War was also developed there. They invent ways of {collecting information}and{protecting {it from surveillance. One branch specialises in criminal mis-use of explosives. Expert advice is given on how to make and move explosives safely. R.A.R.D.E. works closely with the police and {investigates explosions worldwide.
